title: Suryia & Roscoe: The True Story of an Unlikely Friendship
description: Who can imagine an orangutan being friends with a dog? Is it even possible? With Suryia and Roscoe it is!Dogs and orangutans rarely meet, and when they do, they are naturally shy around each other. But when Suryia the orangutan first meets Roscoe, a stray dog, they become best friends from the start.Set on a preserve for rare animals, The Institute of Greatly Endangered and Rare Species (T.I.G.E.R.S.) in South Carolina, here is a true story of a remarkable friendship between two unforgettable animals.Book  HardcoverPublication 4/26/2011 32Reading Age 4 and Up
author: Bhagavan Antle
